item.title: Firms and workers reveal impact of Covid response
item.description: Business owners describe breaking into tears as they were forced to lay off staff, while workers feared for their jobs

item.title: Officers facing misconduct hearing in Harshita Brella case
item.description: Four Northamptonshire Police officers will face misconduct proceedings, a police force says.

item.title: What can nervous businesses expect from the Budget?
item.description: It is going to be a nail-biting final few days for business leaders, says the BBC's Business Editor, Simon Jack.

item.title: What is going on with offside, and can it be fixed?
item.description: After more controversy with subjective offside in the Premier League this weekend, can anything be done to change it?

item.title: Jimmy Cliff, reggae singer with a run of hits spanning decades, dies aged 81
item.description: The musician was known for hits like You Can Get It If You Really Want and I Can See Clearly Now.
